Shurooq has opened their latest beachfront destination in Sharjah, Al Heera Beach. The 3.5km shoreline offers a range of services and facilities, including 18 commercial units with restaurants, cafes, a gym, art installations and a skatepark.
Three of the commercial units have opened today, with the remaining 12 to be opened before the end of the first quarter of 2023.
The project provides an opportunity for investors and entrepreneurs in the entertainment and hospitality sector to expand their ventures in the emirate.
It also features public amenities such as jogging and bicycle tracks, prayer rooms, recreational areas for children and parking for vehicles.
